Our excitement still hadn't cooled by the time we\ngot back to Tsubaki.%K%P
Akane had been deep in thought ever since we left.%K%P
While I didn't know what she was thinking,\nit did look like she'd finally shaken off the gloom\nthat had been hanging over her up until yesterday.%K%P
One thing was for sure, some kind of change\nwas taking place deep in Akane's heart.%K%P
'We're home.'%K%P
'Welcome back.'%K%P
'Welcome home, both of you.'%K%P
Inori was waiting for us in the living room,\nlooking apprehensive.%K%P
'How did it go? Are you feeling any better,\nAkane?'%K%P
'Hm? Yeah, I guess...'%K%P
Her reply was automatic, distracted.%K%P
'Akane, are you listening to me?'%K%P
'Yeah. Yeah, I'm fine.'%K%P
Still focused on whatever she was thinking about,\nAkane barely paid any attention to Inori's questions.%K%P
'AKANE! Just how long are you planning to go on\nliving like this?!'%K%P
Confusing Akane's distraction for a lack of interest,\nInori finally snapped.%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'How long are you going to wander around in a daze?\nThe Akane I know would never give up because\nof a few bumps on the road!'%K%P
'Wh-What's you're problem?\nWhere's all this coming from?'%K%P
It was so rare to hear Inori raise her voice like\nthis, even Akane was too surprised to offer\nmuch of a comeback.%K%P
'Don't you dare try to walk away from this!\nWhy won't you let us in?\nWhy won't you let us help you?!'%K%P
Tears started to well up in the goddess's eyes as\nshe continued to pour out her feelings.%K%P
The shock began to burn off and Akane regained\nenough composure to defend herself.%K%P
'What's all this about? What did I do?'%K%P
'Nothing! That's the point!\nYou've done nothing, you moron!'%K%P
'Huh? What the heck are you talking about?!\nCan't you just calm down for a second?!'%K%P
This kind of argument would usually herald the\narrival of a blackout.%K%P
But going to the concert must have helped\nAkane, as all the lights stayed on.%K%P
'Don't you feel anything toward this place\nor the people you share it with?\nDon't you like living here with us?!'%K%P
'I... Uh, I mean...'%K%P
Akane was lost for words.%K%P
'Sho and Maika have taken us in and made us part\nof their household. They've accepted us even\nthough we're not human like them...'%K%P
'They've treated you no different from any other\nguest, even when they knew you were the cause of the\nblackouts. This hospitality has made me so happy.'%K%P
Inori could barely get her words out fast enough.%K%P
She spoke about her emotions so rarely,\ngetting hit with them all at\nonce was kind of overwhelming.%K%P
'And another thing...'%K%P
Inori faltered and fell silent.%K%P
She spoke slowly now, with quiet intensity.%K%P
'I've enjoyed living here so much.'%K%P
'Ah?!'%K%P
So that was how Inori really felt.\nThat was why she was so mad.%K%P
'With Sho and Maika's help, you even learned to\nstop causing so many blackouts.'%K%P
'I could never have helped you this much all\non my own.'%K%P
It was nice of her to say that, but we couldn't\ntake all the credit.%K%P
She was the one who gathered information\nand liaised with her superiors for\nthe sake of Akane's rehabilitation.%K%P
'That's why I can't let things just fizzle out\nlike this!'%K%P
With that last statement, Inori burst into tears.%K%P
'I get it now...'%K%P
Akane had remained lost in her own thoughts\neven through Inori's tirade, but she seemed to\nhave come to some kind of conclusion.%K%P
'*Hiccup*...*Sniff*... Wh-What...?'%K%P
Akane threw her arms around Inori and\nheld her close, gently stroking her back.%K%P
'When I saw that concert today, I couldn't\nunderstand how the other Divine Idols worked so\nhard, what drives them to keep going.'%K%P
'But I think you may have given me the answer\nI was looking for.'%K%P
'Akane...?'%K%P
'I like living here, too.\nSho's nice and easygoing,\nand Maika's a great cook.'%K%P
'And even if you get on my nerves sometimes,\nI know it's just because you care, Inori.'%K%P
Akane's voice trembled as she spoke.%K%P
'Divine Idols know they're bringing joy to their\nfans. That's what drives them.'%K%P
'I don't think I can work so hard for people\nI don't even know. Not yet.'%K%P
'But I think it might be nice to try to do\nsomething for the people I care about.'%K%P
Akane gave me a look, and I understood.%K%P
This was what she'd been thinking about.%K%P
The problem had never been her rehabilitation.\nShe was trying to process these emotions\nshe was so unused to experiencing.%K%P
I met her gaze and nodded.%K%P
'So I'm not going to quit after all. Thank you for\nsticking by me, Inori.'%K%P
She looked away, embarrassed.\nInori giggled.%K%P
'Wh-What? Did I say something funny?'%K%P
'No, I'm just glad.\nI never thought I'd get to hear\nhow you really feel.'%K%P
'Hmm!'%K%P
'Huh? A blackout?'%K%P
'Oh my. I wonder why it happened now?'%K%P
'I blame Inori!\nWhy'd you have to go and say\nsomething so sappy?!'%K%P
'Oh?! Then it's your fault for starting all this!'%K%P
Though they were fighting again, the two\ngoddesses seemed happy.%K%P
'And here I thought we were going to avoid\nstorms and blackouts for a while.'%K%P
'It was kinda quiet.'%K%P
'I guess we can let it slide this time.'%K%P
'Yeah. This feels normal, for them.'%K%P
'I bet you were just trying to get sentimental\nto change your image, since you're always\nso plain and boring!'%K%P
'And whose fault is that?\nI oughta stitch your mouth shut\nfor spewing such abuse!'%K%P
In Akane and Inori's case, this kind of fighting\nwas just a show of how much they cared.%K%P
'It all worked out in the end, then?'%K%P
'Yeah. Thanks to you.'%K%P
'Me? I didn't really do anything...'%K%P
'Of course you did.\nWithout you, we'd never have\nthought of taking Akane to the concert.'%K%P
'That was just a lucky guess.'%K%P
'You still helped, though. Despite claiming not to\ncare if this place gets knocked down.'%K%P
'I haven't change my mind, if that's what you think.'%K%P
'Sure you haven't.'%K%P
'Shut up. Don't act like you know how I feel.'%K%P
It was just like Maika to hide her true\nfeelings like that.%K%P
'A good-for-nothing goddess like you\ncould never become an idol!'%K%P
'Uuum! I'm definitely 100 percent gonna be one!'%K%P
Akane made this declaration without a hint of\nhesitation.%K%P
